arts.ttl: Wrexham strike back to hold stuttering Leicester - free highlights and report
arts.sum: Nathan Broadhead's equaliser earned Wrexham a 1-1 draw at Leicester that extended his side's unbeaten run to four games in all competitions.
There is a full slate of midweek Championship action across Tuesday and Wednesday and Phil Agius previews all 12 games.

arts.ttl: Leicester vs Wrexham predictions: Foxes to return to winning ways
arts.sum: Leicester have make a solid start to their bid to make an immediate return to the Premier League and Elliott Bretland expects the to take all three points from an entertaining clash at home to Wrexham.

arts.ttl: Monga starts in newlook attack: Leicester City team news and predicted XI to face Wrexham
arts.sum: The latest Leicester City team news as Marti Cifuentes' side gear up to face Wrexham in the Championship on Tuesday night. The post Monga starts in newlook attack: Leicester City team news and predicted XI to face Wrexham appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
